abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is less than another given object.
overview:
## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/YES] if the receiver is less than `object`, otherwise [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NO].

## Discussion

During the evaluation of an `NSWhoseSpecifier` object that contains a test whose operator is `NSLessThanComparison`, an [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/isLessThan(_:)] message may be sent to each potentially specified object, if the potentially specified object does not implement a [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/scriptingIsLessThan(_:)] method and the object being tested against does not implement a [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/scriptingIsGreaterThanOrEqual(to:)] method.

The default implementation for this method provided by `NSObject` method returns [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/YES] if a `compare:` message sent to the same object would return `NSOrderedAscending`.

# isLessThan(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is less than another given object.

## Declaration

```swift
func isLessThan(_ object: Any?) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **object**: The object with which to compare the receiver.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/YES] if the receiver is less than `object`, otherwise [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NO].

## Discussion

During the evaluation of an `NSWhoseSpecifier` object that contains a test whose operator is `NSLessThanComparison`, an [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/isLessThan(_:)] message may be sent to each potentially specified object, if the potentially specified object does not implement a [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/scriptingIsLessThan(_:)] method and the object being tested against does not implement a [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/scriptingIsGreaterThanOrEqual(to:)] method.

The default implementation for this method provided by `NSObject` method returns [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/YES] if a `compare:` message sent to the same object would return `NSOrderedAscending`.
title: isLessThan(_:)
